response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $10,000 by both parties. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending this opportunity to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. This is a special offer, designed to ensure you receive the best value while allowing us to maintain a competitive edge in the market. I believe this price point aligns well with the perceived value of the product and presents a unique opportunity for both of us. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
